selo.BNB: Spent several years in the credit card and billing division, handling financial reconciliation, customer tools, and streamlining internal reporting systems.
selo.UNIFOR: Graduated with a degree in Computer Science and kicked off my career through internships and project coordination, managing critical tech infrastructure early on.
selo.SANA: Been working with this NGO since 2020, focusing on improving communication and teamwork in an IT team that’s strong technically but needed more human connection.
selo.SEDIH: Currently acting as a senior analyst, building scalable tools that support the Secretariat’s entire digital ecosystem and enhance public service delivery.
